has research problem: single visual - semantic hierarchy over words , sentences , and images

has research problem.from sentence: Hypernymy , textual entailment , and image captioning can be seen as special cases of a single visual - semantic hierarchy over words , sentences , and images .
In fact , all three relations can be seen as special cases of a partial order over images and language , illustrated in , which we refer to as the visualsemantic hierarchy .
